channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very poor road surface., 23rd March
item.description:
Large areas where top surface missing long area of damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hatherley Lodge Down Hatherley Lane, Down Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole 25 Littledownn Road Cheltenham, 23rd March
item.description:
Big ‘ole! Needs sorting quickly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Saint Margaret's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Soil dumped on road, 23rd March
item.description:
The soil flytipped on the road has been left while the other rubbish has been removed. There is a skid risk

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Derden Meats Holly Brae Dog Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New Signage -obstruction to visibility Manor Road GL51 9TX, 23rd March
item.description:
Carpet Right of Manor Rd, Cheltenham GL51 9RR have erected signage for their nearby shop at Gallagher Retail on the corner of Manor Road & Mackenzie Way GL51 9TX, near the Bence Roofing location. As occupants of a property at Manor Park Business Centre GL51 9TX we can see a potential problem with visibility to Manor Road, as turning onto the road (60 mph limit) is potentially hazardous at normal times. No consultation with local businesses was made prior to the installation of sign.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Unit A1 Mackenzie Way, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More potholes on this road., 23rd March
item.description:
Down Hatherley Lane has been in horrendous state for months. Cars driving on wrong side of road to avoid potholes. Accidents waiting to happen. Why is this being ignored?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Down Hatherley Lane, Down Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping along Barnwood Bypass, 23rd March
item.description:
There is a serious problem with flytipping along the whole of the Barnwood Bypass. Every day seems to bring more rubbish and the whole area looks very unsightly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 97 Sussex Gardens, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrowth, 23rd March
item.description:
The alley is disappearing due to overgrown nettles and bramble bushes. Highways no longer care about how bad the town looks. This used to be a lovely little nature walk for small children but now you can’t even get through some of it. It goes round all the way to the back of Springbank School.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Gristmill Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: River Chelt Rubish, 21st March
item.description:
The banks of the river chelt along this stretch, which backs onto residential properties is strewn with rubbish. It was washed down stream after the heavy rain last month. The rubbish is not only an eye saw, but is also a danger to residents, with objects with sharp metallic edges. Some of the rubbish has built up so it hinders the river’s flow during heavy rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Newland View, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Persistent puddle of water, 20th March
item.description:
It may be nothing but this puddle has been there for a long time (many weeks) and I am wondering if it is a sign of a drainage issue or small leakage that may get worse if not investigated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 77a The Park, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole at least 4inch deep at centre, 20th March
item.description:
This pot hole has been getting wider over the last 2 months making it difficult to maneuver past with out vehicle hitting it causing issue to a vehicles tracking and stability. It is adjacent to the turning to a housing development on hanover street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Hanover Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes/ broken road surface, 20th March
item.description:
Broken road surface and potholes trip hazard and risk to cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 120 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken road surface, 20th March
item.description:
Part of the problem resolved by filling main pot hole but other faults not rectified. Job not fully completed so re reporting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 120 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 x potholes, 20th March
item.description:
Surface breaking up causing a trip hazard and risk to cyclists

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 120 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 19th March
item.description:
The whole of this road from A38 to elmstone hardwick is a disgrace. Massive potholes it’s dangerous for cars and cycles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cursey Lane, Elmstone Hardwicke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large, deep pothole on Oxford Walk, 19th March
item.description:
It has clearly been here for some time

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1b Oxford Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Litter, 19th March
item.description:
Litter chucked in the hedges/verge along this section of road, including what looks like bottles of urine.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Gloucester Business Park Golf Club Lane, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 19th March
item.description:
Street light not working, needs to be fixed, been like this for a while now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Sapphire Way, Abbeymead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sapphire Way to Gauntlet Road, 19th March
item.description:
Whole section of road needs tarmac put down - looks like it was never finished & forgotten following completion of devlopment.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 50 Gauntlet Road, Abbeymead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement slab that has lifted outside River Island, 19th March
item.description:
My friend was walking past River Island and tripped on a raised loose paving stone. She fell and has broken a bone in each of her hands , has very severely bruised ribs and a badly grazed knee. This pavement is just one example of many in the town which are a real hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 151 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of potholes of varying sizes, 19th March
item.description:
These potholes have been here for a while and getting worse
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 87 Saint Georges Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
